aboutpara:
I am a Conestoga College student pursuing a Computer Systems Technician (Information Technology Infrastructure and Services) course. I have strong knowledge of Network Infrastructure (including concepts of network protocols, routing, and creating LAN and WAN), Network Security (including concepts of configuring Palo Alto Firewalls- Zoning, Security Policies, NAT policies, and Site-to-Site VPNs), 

I also have good experience in Blog Writing and Creative Content Writing, including Search Engine Optimization knowledge and techniques in the text. I am a good team person, ready to learn new skills and put additional effort into fulfilling my commitments to the organization.

education.universityName: Computer Systems Technician- Information Technology Infrastructure and Services
education.universityPara: Proficient in computer hardware and software installation, configuration, and maintenance. Skilled in troubleshooting technical issues and supporting network infrastructures. Experienced in managing operating systems, implementing cybersecurity measures, and utilizing scripting for automation. Knowledgeable in database management and cloud computing fundamentals.
